ï»¿TITLE: BACKGROUND Bratz exploded onto the scene in 2001 and instantly flipped the script on the fashion doll world. Born as a bold, diverse squad of four with a passion for fashion, the Bratz became a global pop culture phenomenon almost overnight. Yasmin, Cloe, Sasha, and Jade werenâ€™t your motherâ€™s dolls â€” they were daring, full of personality, and culturally on-point, offering an unapologetic alternative to the norm. Embracing differences from day one and serving looks never before seen in the toy aisle, Bratz stole hearts (and market share), proving that a little attitude and a lot of style can spark a revolution. Over 25 years later, Bratz isnâ€™t just a line of dolls â€” itâ€™s a full-on lifestyle and entertainment universe. Strutting across generations, screens, and shelves, Bratz is here to put the world on blast: be fierce, be fearless, be fashionable and there's no limit to how far you can go. TITLE: BRAND ESSENCE Bratz isnâ€™t just a toy brand, itâ€™s a movement: when youâ€™re true to yourself, you run the world â€” and you do it with style. Bratz are the dolls with a â€œpassion for fashionâ€ who have inspired generations to be themselves, boldly and unapologetically. We are the franchise that proves fashion is power â€” an unfiltered way to express who you are without having to say a word. We champion the ones who arenâ€™t afraid to stand out. Bratz celebrates individuality, diversity, and confidence, all wrapped in a loud, trendsetting package. Strut it, babe. TITLE: CORE VALUES Fashion-Forward Creativity Fashion-Forward Creativity Authentic Self-Expression Inclusive & Diverse Empowering & Confident Playful & Passionate Bratz lives and dies by fashion innovation. Style is our language and weâ€™re fluent in it. We believe in bold choices, creative flair, and setting trends â€” all day, every day. BRATZ ARE: Trendsetters and style innovators, constantly pushing the envelope. If itâ€™s fresh, expressive, and elevated with intention, weâ€™re all about it, hun. BRATZ ARE NOT: Copycats or trend-chasers. Youâ€™ll never catch Bratz playing it safe or riding on someone elseâ€™s coattails. Boring clothes? Couldnâ€™t be us. Authentic Self-Expression Bratz values total authenticity. We encourage everyone to let their personality shine, quirks and all. Being your proud self is always in style. BRATZ ARE: 100% real. Our tone is candid and our characters are true to themselves down to their tastes in fashion, music, art â€” you name it! BRATZ ARE NOT: Fake or forced. No phony positivity, no pandering. Bratz doesnâ€™t sugarcoat or conform to please others. We donâ€™t do â€œplastic perfect.â€ Inclusive & Diverse Bratz is a multi-cultural mosaic and we love it that way. Diversity isnâ€™t a buzzword; itâ€™s in our DNA. BRATZ ARE: Inclusive, welcoming, and representative. We embrace and showcase different skin tones, cultures, perspectives, and beauty that isnâ€™t boxed-in. BRATZ ARE NOT: Exclusive or stereotypical. But thereâ€™s a line between sass and disrespect and we donâ€™t cross it. â€œFashion is a way to say who you are even before you speak.â€ â€“ Sasha TITLE: BRATZ IN CULTURE THE BRATZ EFFECT Bratz are built differently â€”fact. TITLE: BRATZ CHARACTERS THE GIRLZ Yasmin â€“ â€œPretty Princessâ€ Cloe â€“ â€œAngelâ€ Sasha â€“ â€œBunny Booâ€ Jade â€“ â€œKool Katâ€ TITLE: BRATZ CHARACTERS YASMIN â€” â€œPretty Princessâ€ Yasmin is the soulful bohemian of the Bratz Pack, often seen as the heart of the group. Nicknamed â€œPretty Princess,â€ she exudes an easy, natural confidence. Yasmin is a warm, empathetic spirit. Often the voice of reason and kindness among the Bratz, sheâ€™s known for her love of nature and humanitarian streak. Think of her as equal parts earthy and glamourous â€” she might be meditating with crystals one minute and interviewing a celebrity for the Bratz magazine the next. Yasmin is creative (she journals and writes songs/poetry), and her friends come to her when they need advice or a pep talk. Sheâ€™s got a chill vibe but donâ€™t mistake that for weakness â€” when itâ€™s time to stand up for whatâ€™s right, Yasmin is quietly fierce. Yasminâ€™s Vibe â€œBe kind, be true, be youâ€¦and never forget to accessorize.â€ Style Yasminâ€™s fashion sense is boho-chic meets funky vintage. She adores floral prints, flowy fabrics, and a touch of animal print for drama. Youâ€™ll catch her in earth tones mixed with pops of bold color. Platforms or wedges win over stilettos (gotta stay grounded!) and sheâ€™s often rocking accessories like a flower in her hair, a wide belt, or globally-inspired jewelry. Makeup Her makeup is a bit softer compared to her girls â€” warm tones, shimmery eyes. TITLE: BRATZ CHARACTERS CLOE â€” â€œAngelâ€ Cloe is the spunky, sparkly, all-American girl of the group. Sheâ€™s affectionately called â€œAngelâ€ because she has heavenly style and a big heart. With her head often in the clouds, Cloe is the angelic face with a devilish fun side who is all about big dreams and big drama. Sheâ€™s enthusiastic, outgoing, and sometimes a total goof (in the best way). Emotion is Cloeâ€™s middle name â€” she feels everything deeply and isnâ€™t afraid to show it. One minute sheâ€™s over the moon, the next sheâ€™s dramatically pouting because, like, her outfit didnâ€™t slay as hard as she thought. (Melodrama, thy name is Cloe.) Cloe's optimism and energy are infectious. Sheâ€™ll often give advice (Ã  la her â€œDear Cloeâ€ column in the magazine) but might not take her own advice. And while sheâ€™s a little clumsy and occasionally spacey, Cloeâ€™s smart, not ditzy. Sometimes she just needs her friends to bring her back down to earth! Despite getting a little anxious in the spotlight, Cloe enjoys acting â€” she's already a drama queen 24/7! Sheâ€™s basically the human equivalent of glitter â€” bright, fun, occasionally messy, but always bringing the sparkle. Personality Snapshot Energetic, fearless, a touch dramatic but endlessly devoted. Life to her is meant to be full of feeling. Cloeâ€™s Vibe "If youâ€™re not living on the edge, youâ€™re taking up too much space â€” now pass the glitter!â€ Style Cloeâ€™s fashion passion is glam with an edge. She loves sparkly fabrics and exotic animal prints. Think sequins, faux fur trim denim, leopard cow or zebra patterns, and anything that shines. She isnâ€™t afraid of a bold ensemble â€” mixing a sporty denim jacket with a frilly skirt and cowboy boots. Her outfit color palette is often icy blues, hot pinks, and animal print neutrals. TITLE: BRATZ CHARACTERS SASHA â€” â€œBunny Booâ€ Sasha is the fierce firecracker of the Bratz. TITLE: BRATZ CHARACTERS JADE â€”â€œKOOL KATâ€ Jade is the cutting-edge cool girl of the group. Her nickname â€œKool Katâ€ says it all â€” sheâ€™s creative, bold, and has a bit of a wild side. Sheâ€™s also tech-savvy and smart â€” into things like coding or tinkering (yes, she can fix your computer and redesign your wardrobe). Jade is a fashion daredevil â€” sheâ€™ll try the wildest looks and somehow make them work. Her look mixes punk, goth, and couture in a blender and tops it with a dash of kawaii. She might pair a tartan punk skirt with a neon crop top and platform boots, then add a necktie belt just because. Layers, textures, and experimental silhouettes are her jam. One day sheâ€™s in a sleek vinyl jacket, the next sheâ€™s wearing a frilly Lolita-inspired dress over fishnet stockings. Her signature colors often include red, mustard, gunmetal, olive, bold blacks and whites with animal print and a touch of pink for a bit of irony. And accessories? She invents new ones. She might DIY a purse or customize her jacket with pins and patches. Makeup Jadeâ€™s known to rock edgy makeup: maybe a bold colored streak in her hair (she isnâ€™t afraid to dye it funky colors), dramatic cat eyeliner, or experimental eyeshadow. Likes â€¢ Fashion design (sheâ€™s always sketching ideas or sewing up new outfits) â€¢ Science & tech (fans know Jade has a secret nerdy side; she loves science class and might be found geeking out over a chemistry set or new gadget) â€¢ Adrenaline hits (sheâ€™s down to try things like amusement park rides, skydiving, etc. â€“ sheâ€™s adventurous!). â€¢ Being lifestyle editor for the magazine, running the â€œcouture and cultureâ€ segment for all things trendy. TITLE: BRATZ FASHION FASHION RULEZ Fashion is a Bratz Core Value and a Narrative Pillar. Fashion isnâ€™t just clothing for us â€” itâ€™s character, story, and attitude all rolled into one. So how do we make sure that Bratz fashion always serves Bratz realness? These Fashion Rulez describe what shapes Bratz fashion and how we bring it so that our Bratz fashion always rules! â€¢ HIGH FASHION X STREET FASHION FUSION â€¢ NO FEAR, ALL FUN â€¢ TRENDS SET, NOT FOLLOWED â€¢ CHARACTER-CENTRIC WARDROBES FASHION FLEXIBILITY: EVOLVING STYLE High Fashion X Street Fashion Fusion From day one, Bratz pulled inspiration from the runways of Paris to the sidewalks of LA. We mix high fashion with underground street trends to create something fresh. Our designers ask, â€œWhatâ€™s the coolest thing out there right now, and how do we push it further?â€ We love contrasts: glam vs. gritty, new vs. vintage, cute vs. edgy. This fusion gives Bratz its trendsetting edge. Weâ€™re not copying what we see â€“ weâ€™re remixing and elevating it. No Fear, All Fun The Bratz fashion philosophy? More expression, less inhibition. We donâ€™t believe in â€œtoo muchâ€ â€” as long as itâ€™s done with

one, Bratz pulled inspiration from the runways of Paris to the sidewalks of LA. We mix high fashion with underground street trends to create something fresh. Our designers ask, â€œWhatâ€™s the coolest thing out there right now, and how do we push it further?â€ We love contrasts: glam vs. gritty, new vs. vintage, cute vs. edgy. This fusion gives Bratz its trendsetting edge. Weâ€™re not copying what we see â€“ weâ€™re remixing and elevating it. No Fear, All Fun The Bratz fashion philosophy? More expression, less inhibition. We donâ€™t believe in â€œtoo muchâ€ â€” as long as itâ€™s done with intention. Whether itâ€™s bold layering, clashing prints, or a daring silhouette, Bratz fashion is about experimentation, play, and personal flair. We donâ€™t play it safe, because our fans donâ€™t want safe â€” they want style that turns heads and feels like them. Trends Set, Not Followed Weâ€™re early on trends (e.g., Bratz had streetwear-inspired looks before â€œathleisureâ€ was even a word) or creating trends ourselves. Example? Our early 2000s oversized belts, wild chunky highlights, and platform shoes seemed extreme until a few years later when everyone was rocking that look. If mini bags are in, we make them micro mini. If neon is in, we do graffiti-covered neon. Always amp it up a notch. Character-Centric Wardrobes Each Bratz girl has a distinct point of view â€” thatâ€™s by design. Yasminâ€™s earthy boho glam, Cloeâ€™s sparkly sporty chic, Sashaâ€™s streetwear luxe, and Jadeâ€™s punky experimental edge serve as unique frameworks that guide their styling across dolls, media, and merchandise. While their individual aesthetics stand on their own, they always look like a cohesive crew. A Bratz lineup should feel like a group you believe â€” different vibes, same energy. Fashion Flexibility: Evolving Style The Girlzâ€™ â€œdefaultâ€ fashion vibes are just the starting point. Like real trendsetters, the Bratz evolve and remix their looks to reflect new moments, moods, and eras. Whether itâ€™s red carpet glam, retro revival, fantasy fairies, or festival-core, their styles adapt while staying unmistakably them. CREATING LOOKS Bratz fashion is about innovation, self-expression, and a touch of rebellion. We draw inspiration from everywhere â€” youth culture, music videos, club scenes, vintage fashion archives, and our own Bratz history. Designers sketch freely and often, then we pick the loudest, proudest ideas to refine. And yes, we absolutely consider input from our fan community â€” they are often re-styling dolls and making fan art, which is an incredible inspiration pool. Bratz fashion thrives on that exchange of ideas: from the world to Bratz and back to the world. Fashion is our art form and our playground; every Bratz doll is a mini canvas to reflect that. While our mantra is often â€œmore is more,â€ we also know that restraint can be powerful. A well-placed detail, a refined silhouette, or a quiet contrast can hit just as hard. Whether itâ€™s loud or lowkey, the look should always feel intentional, expressive, and unmistakably Bratz. [Pop-Out] Mood boards for Bratz designs might have

TITLE: BRAND VOICE ESSENTIALS BRATZ VOICE Our Bratz Voice Is: â€¢ Sassy & Playful â€¢ Empowering & Positive â€¢ Unfiltered & Real â€¢ Culturally Fluent â€¢ Humorous but Heartfelt Sassy & Playful Bratz always has a little wink in her words. Our tone is full of attitude but never mean. We love to exaggerate for drama (â€œliterally died when I saw those shoes ğŸ˜â€), drop puns like accessories, and serve every line with a signature twist. Casual emoji use? Of course â€” we sprinkle them like glitter. And we donâ€™t simply borrow slang â€” we make our own. Bratz has always had its own dictionary. Itâ€™s part of what makes us feel larger-than-life and itâ€™s a loveable piece of Bratz DNA that still quote. Empowering & Positive While we crack jokes and keep it light, the Bratz voice always uplifts. We cheer on our fans and our characters. Phrases like â€œyou got this,â€ â€œgo for it!â€ â€œown it, girlâ€ appear often. Even when acknowledging challenges (â€œNervous about that audition? Same, girl.â€), we pivot to encouragement (â€œBut you know weâ€™re gonna rock it anywayâ€). We're like a fitting room pep talk â€” honest but positive. Importantly, we promote self-compassion and acceptance: no self-deprecation beyond maybe a tiny comedic quip (â€œI tripped in these platforms â€” klutz moment! â€” but hey, at least I did it fabulouslyâ€). The Bratz voice builds confidence. Unfiltered & Real Bratz doesnâ€™t use corporate jargon or feel scripted. We write the way our fans talk to each other â€” casually, expressively, and a little chaotically in the best way. That means we sometimes start sentences with â€œAndâ€ or â€œSo,â€ we ask rhetorical questions (â€œGuess what happened at the show last night?!â€), and we play with ALL CAPS or elongated vowels for drama (â€œThat outfit is cuuuuute!â€). And we name real things â€” because we live in that world. But we donâ€™t try so hard to seem relatable that it gets cringey. Sure, weâ€™ll drop a â€œslay,â€ â€œfab,â€ or â€œYas queen!â€ now and then â€” but only if it feels authentic. Bratz speak Bratz â€” and thatâ€™s already its own dialect ğŸ’ª. Culturally Fluent Bratz stays in the conversation â€” but we donâ€™t shout to be heard. Our voice is

Culturally Fluent Bratz stays in the conversation â€” but we donâ€™t shout to be heard. Our voice is tapped into whatâ€™s trending in fashion, music, internet culture, and design, but we use that fluency with intention and restraint. Weâ€™ll reference a meme or a trending topic â€” but only when it feels true to the brand. Weâ€™re never trying to go viral. We just live in the moment â€” and sometimes, the moment follows us.
